description: a(1) = 1. Let a(n) be the most recently defined term. At each step, check for an undefined term with index < n. If such a term exists, then where i is the earliest such index, set a(i) = a(n) - (n - i). If no such term exists, then where i is the first undefined index >= n + a(n), set a(i) = the smallest integer not yet used.
